settings.title: The alarm that makes your pool safer
settings.text: Protect your pool with the only AI based drowning detection system

settings.title: Pool entrance identification
settings.text: Our technology detects all accidental and deliberate pool entry with pets and toddlers over 12lbs to adults, easing or stepping into the pool or falling or diving in. A notification is sent to your mobile phone while sounding an alarm through your garden and home.

settings.title: Drowning detection
settings.text: The system detects the sounds of human distress signals at an early stage and warns of this in a local announcement, in the nearby building and in the pool holder's smartphone.

settings.title:
Listens
to water 24/7
settings.text: Created by IDF Marine Seal veterans, acoustic & digital processing experts and medical and marine engineers that share more than 120 years of combined experience. This means means our underwater acoustic technology is a cut above any others on the market right now.

settings.title: Our benefits
settings.text: SOSense is a high-tech hydroponic sensor that detects all pool entry & accidents. Alert you of pool entries and drownings faster than any other device on the market. This is the AI lifeguard that every pool-owning household needsâ€¦

settings.title:
Almost 6500 children
younger than 15 years
were treated for pool
settings.title_second: Died from drowning or almost died from drowning
settings.text_second:
Some stats you may find useful:
According to the CDC, drowning is the number one cause of unintentional death for children between the ages of 1 and 4.

settings.title:
There is no other technology like this
in the pool drowning
alarm market
settings.text: There is a gap in the market for pool drowning detection alarms, so our company mission is to develop our unique disruptive underwater acoustic technology as the global standard for pool safety. We intend on SOSense becoming the acoustic technology that is the standard safety feature in all private pools.
Simple set up no tools required
Get Mobile Notifications Alarm Also Sounds In Yard & Home
Seasonal battery Life.           6 Months Between Charges
Pool Alarm Entry Detection For Pools Of 20x40ft
Works With Bluetooth Via Mobile Application
Detects and Sounds Alarm On Human and Pet Entry

settings.title: How the technology works
settings.text: Using our advanced technology, our products are able to correctly identify and monitor all pool entries. This function gives each user peace of mind knowing that they have an additional layer of supervising the pool.
settings.text_second:
Our system itself is meant to be
a supplemental aid and, when mounted
in the pool, generates alerts via
its advanced acoustic sensors and AI-algorithm technology transferred
to the Home Unit and, subsequently,
to the app on the user's phone.

settings.title: The #1 cause of death for under 5s
settings.text: In the United States, drowning is the leading cause of death for children 1-4 years of age. Although nothing can replace adult supervision, SOSense is a step in a safer direction.

settings.title: Swimming pool drowning deaths are preventable
settings.text: 23% of child drownings happen during a family gathering near a pool. Our pool detection alarm system sounds through the yard, your home and on your phone.

settings.title: Summer is the most deadly time
settings.text: Summertime should be a happy time, where family is reunited with garden barbecues and pool parties - but itâ€™s during these months, June, July and August that the majority of pool related deaths occur, with most of them being in backyard pools.

settings.title: 390 pool-related deaths a year in the US
settings.text: Every year, there are 390 swimming pool and spa related death in the US, according to the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission.
